Critical/technical thinker with a delivery mindset (and a calendar full of standups).

jobs.meta: 2025-present, Prague - Kubernetes - Helm - ArgoCD - GitOps - Observability - Edge/IoT
jobs.description: Led migrations from VM-based apps to Kubernetes, designed cutover/rollback plans and containerized services with Helm for repeatable releases. Implemented GitOps with ArgoCD (app structure, promotion flows, policies) to keep deployments auditable and hands-off. Built end-to-end observability (metrics/logs/traces), dashboards, alerts and runbooks to shorten MTTR and improve SLO tracking. Championed OSS tooling and IoT/edge integrations for lightweight edge workloads and centralized fleet management.

roast.title: Roast Me
content: If infrastructure is code, mine is probably over-engineered enough to file for an art grant. I promise it's on purpose. Mostly.
I speak fluent YAML, occasionally to my coffee machine. Side effects include reliable platforms, smug dashboards, and the inability to explain my job to relatives.
